message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you our premium product at a special price. I believe it would be a great fit for you!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. However, I'm looking to spend no more than $10000. Would you be able to match this price?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer but I'm looking to spend no more than $10000. Would you be willing to sell the product for this price?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the lowest I can go on this product is $13000 given its value and quality. Let me know if this works for you!
Thank you for coming down in price, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I'm trying to stick to my budget. Would you be able to sell the product for $11500?
Thank you for coming down in price, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I'm trying to stick to my budget. Would you be able to sell the product for $11500?

Bob, I see you're trying to stay within your budget, and I appreciate your position. I can come down a bit more to meet you halfway. How about $12500? This is the best I can do while still valuing the product appropriately.
